name: ReadableConstraints
summary: A swift 2.0 library that makes it easier to write constraints using iOS9+ constraint system
description:
ReadableConstraints aims to be a less cryptic, easy-to-read constraint system
that wraps the iOS9 constraint calls.  Instead of having to dedicate an entire
line to a constraint, simply write `ctr1.isLeftOf(ctr1.BY, 10).isAbove(.BY,10)`
